title: New skins
body: so over the many years ive played LoL im still waiting to see some good skins for rengar, voli and so many other champs they have skins i know but no decent ones i wanna see some efx also the game finder system is total bs alway someone leaving queue takes a day to find surely there way or administrating the lobbys ive played many online game  with basic admin in lobby to assure gameplay is being done correctly and fairly
